channel.title: Pasión de las Pasiones (One Shot)
channel.description:
![78c669e04624d2873ab830faa92f2e7dc4f8273c|690x460](upload://psp4bMeRMMKA70vBlH6bKaKMUeK.jpeg)
This session is scheduled for 4 hours. The session will be recorded if everyone is cool with it! If not, no worries. We will be using Streamyard.
**Pasión de las Pasiones** is a PbtA tabletop role-playing game where you play the cast of the world’s most dramatic and exciting telenovela: *Pasión de las Pasiones* , as well as the family watching at home. In **Pasión de las Pasiones** , lies will be exposed, plots will be shattered, hearts will be broken, and if you’re lucky, you might even get a happy ending…at least for now.
Safety tools: We will be using script change, lines and veils, and an open door policy. We can change these tools to whatever suits the table best. This game follows [The Gauntlet's Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
One Shot: [date=2019-12-14 time=18:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LtJ9OVz34-0wWkxbR2K
